id.description: A unique identifier for the metafield.

namespace.description: The namespace for the metafield, used to group related metafields together.

key.description: The key or name of the metafield.

value.description: The actual value stored in the metafield.

value_type.description: The data type of the value stored in the metafield (e.g., string, integer).

description.description: The description or purpose of the metafield.

owner_id.description: The ID of the resource (e.g., product, order) that owns the metafield.

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated.

owner_resource.description: The type of resource (e.g., product, order) that owns the metafield.

type.description: The data type of the value stored in the metafield (e.g., string, integer).

admin_graphql_api_id.description: A unique identifier for the metafield within Shopify's GraphQL Admin API.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the metafield is associated.
